name: Energy Crysis (NatashaMangan, JonasChristensen, Salooverall, Prasadidasi)
description:
A 2D point and click game with some resource management. Carry out your daily tasks in your house and keep track of how much energy you consume. But what is going on outside?

Credits:

Moa Bruus - ArtistNatasha Bianca Mangan - UI, Game Programmer

Abhinav Prasad - Game Programmer Jonas Christensen  - Music Composer

External Assets:

The VFX assets were taken from the Unity Asset store: Effect textures and prefabs by Magicpot Inc.

The sound assets are taken from FreeSound.org and Oculus Audio Pack 01.

Researcher:

Carolina Hiller: https://www.ri.se/sv/person/carolina-hiller

This game was built in collaboration with a Researcher from R.I.S.E, the goal was to talk about their current projects, draw inspiration and design a game.
